channel.title: Need help with tokkulscape 3.5 (dont suggest another source)
channel.description:
ok so i recently downloaded tokkulscape 3.5 added lots more commands and moved npcs etc...
but wen i try to wear dragon chainbody or dragon platebody it says i need to complete dragonslayer.
so i go to start dragonslayer get up to second part were i need to talk to oziach and i can't get any further than that wtf?
but all i want to know is...
how do i change it so i can wear dragon chainbody/platebody wwithout doing quest?
please help someone im begging yous.

item.title: Need help with tokkulscape 3.5 (dont suggest another source)

item.description:
@darklord1 wrote:

none of us could fix this so anyone that knows how to plz help me.

Read full topic
